If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Relying on intuition and a discerning eye, LA native and Ella Moss designer Pamella Protzel Scott specializes in flowy, feminine pieces with the comfort of a T-shirt. Quirky, fashionable, and casual, with a bit of an edge, her designs have earned Ella Moss a strong following among celebs and everyday women alike since its launch in 2002. With Ella Moss, the choice between comfort and chic doesn't have to be black and white: each dress, shirt, and cardigan radiates effortless style.
